com.bws.jdistil.core.validation
Class DefaultValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.bws.jdistil.core.validation.DefaultValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProcessor
public class DefaultValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProcessor

Default validator used to validate data from a given servlet request. Dependent upon information defined in configuration manager.

Author:
Bryan Snipes

createDataMap

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> createDataMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Returns a map of field IDs and values created using a given servlet request. Only non-empty fields are added to map.
